### Model Building

* More on outliers and influencial points: PMA6 Ch 7.8 and 8.8
* Got a moderator? Check out Interaction terms in PMA6 Ch 8.8 and ASCN 10.3
* Multicollinearity (highly correlated X values): PMA6 8.9 and ASCN 10.5
* How to choose variables for your model sensibly: PMA6 Chapter 9, ASCN 10.6
